title: Stan Lee - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/28/22
itunes:title: Stan Lee - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/28/22
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and author Abraham Reisman explore the career of Stan Lee at Marvel Comics, and whether he may have taken too much credit for creating famous comic book characters like the Hulk and the Fantastic Four, while minimizing the input of the artists he worked with like Jack Kirby.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Guest host Ian Punnett and author Abraham Reisman explore the career of Stan Lee at Marvel Comics, and whether he may have taken too much credit for creating famous comic book characters like the Hulk and the Fantastic Four, while minimizing the input of the artists he worked with like Jack Kirby.
